properties.name: Source
properties.description: The source of the batch, e.g. 'Enamine', 'E-Molecule', 'Sigma-Aldrich', 'ACME'

properties.name: Purity
properties.description: The purity of the batch, e.g. 99.9%

properties.name: Synthesized Date
properties.description: The date the batch was synthesized, e.g. '2025-01-01'

properties.name: Responsible Party
properties.description: The responsible party for the batch, e.g. 'chemist1', 'Sue Leader', 'Brad Buyer'

properties.name: ELN Reference
properties.description: The ELN reference for the batch, e.g. 'cchemist-789-1'

properties.name: Project
properties.description: The project the batch is part of, e.g. 'Project 1', 'Project 2'

synonym_types.name: EPA Batch ID
synonym_types.description: The EPA assigned batch ID of the batch, e.g. '1234567890'
